common.maxComparison: You can compare up to 4 devices.
common.loginError: Incorrect login or password. Please try again.
common.needAuthFavorite: Hearts are for members only! Log in or register to add to favorites ❤️

compare.title: Smartphone Comparison
compare.noPhonesSelected: You have not selected any smartphones for comparison.
compare.name: Name
compare.noPhonesSelectedDescription: Add up to four devices from the main page to see their differences.
compare.cpuMultiCoreExplanation: Processor performance when utilizing all cores.
compare.cpuSingleCoreExplanation: Processor performance when utilizing a single core.
compare.gamingFpsExplanation: Average and minimum frames per second in games.
compare.processorExplanation: The model of the central processor, affecting performance.
compare.batteryExplanation: Battery capacity in milliampere-hours (mAh), determining battery life.
compare.screenExplanation: The diagonal size of the screen in inches.
compare.osExplanation: Operating system installed on the smartphone (e.g., Android, iOS).
compare.camerasExplanation: Main and front cameras, their specifications.
compare.ramExplanation: Amount of RAM in gigabytes (GB), affecting multitasking.
compare.storageExplanation: Amount of built-in storage in gigabytes (GB) for data.
compare.refreshRateExplanation: Screen refresh rate in Hertz (Hz), affecting image smoothness.
compare.resolutionExplanation: Number of pixels on the screen (width x height).
compare.weightExplanation: Weight of the smartphone in grams (g).
compare.bodyMaterialExplanation: Material from which the smartphone body is made.
compare.waterResistanceExplanation: Presence of water and dust protection.
compare.mainCameraApertureExplanation: Main camera aperture value (lower number means better low-light performance).
compare.5gSupportExplanation: Support for 5G networks for high-speed internet.
compare.fingerprintScannerExplanation: Presence of a fingerprint scanner for unlocking.
compare.nfcExplanation: Presence of an NFC module for contactless payments and data exchange.
compare.microsdSlotExplanation: Presence of a microSD card slot.
compare.releaseDateExplanation: Official release date of the smartphone on the market.
compare.stereoSpeakersExplanation: Presence of stereo speakers for surround sound.
compare.headphoneJackExplanation: Presence of a standard 3.5mm headphone jack.
compare.connectivityExplanation: Supported wireless communication standards (Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, etc.).
compare.dimensionsExplanation: Smartphone dimensions (height x width x thickness).
compare.frontDesignExplanation: Description of the front appearance of the smartphone.
compare.bottomDesignExplanation: Description of the bottom appearance of the smartphone.
compare.frameDesignExplanation: Description of the material and design of the smartphone frame.
compare.specialFeaturesExplanation: Additional unique functions or features of the smartphone.
compare.screenSpecialFeaturesExplanation: Special screen technologies or functions (e.g., Always-On Display).
compare.soundSpecialFeaturesExplanation: Additional features of the sound system.
compare.batteryAutonomyExplanation: Approximate operating time of the smartphone on a single charge.
compare.batterySpecialFeaturesExplanation: Additional features related to the battery.
compare.ppiExplanation: Pixels per inch density, affecting image sharpness.

login.server_error: Server error. Please try again later.

register.registration_successful: Registration successful! You can now log in.
register.server_error: Server error. Please try again later.
